definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: Where do you think this user would look for a cue?
sentences.chinese: 那麼你認爲他會在哪裏找這些線索呢？

sentences.english: A small piece of pottery under a rock might be a clue to the past.
sentences.chinese: 岩石下面的一小片兒瓷器可能就是研究過去的線索。

sentences.english: Find the first clue unraveling the mystery.
sentences.chinese: 找到了第一條解謎的線索。

sentences.english: The case was uncovered, little by little, by the finding of clues.
sentences.chinese: 這個案子是根據線索一點一點地捯出來的。

sentences.english: The police ferreted about all over the house for clues.
sentences.chinese: 線索把那屋子裏裏外外都搜遍了。

sentences.english: Yet he did not always take his cue from Thalia, the muse of comedy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他並不總是把他從塔利亞，繆斯的喜劇線索。

sentences.english: Each of the above-mentioned two aspects has its developing clue.
sentences.chinese: 上述兩個維面，各有其源遠流長的承傳發展線索。

sentences.english: Using cues, clues and hints to detect the hidden relationships.
sentences.chinese: 運用各種暗示點對隱藏的事理邏輯線索進行探查。

sentences.english: It also has the function of measuring leads for multimeter.
sentences.chinese: 它也有功能的測量線索，萬用表。

sentences.english: We have clues, many clues, but very few firm conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 我們有線索，許多線索，但可靠的結論卻很少。

sentences.english: We have clues, many clues, but very few firm conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 我們有線索，許多線索，但可靠的結論卻很少。

sentences.english: The academic field which has developed to study placenames is called toponymy.
sentences.chinese: 而地名學就是以語言爲基本線索，研究地名的科學。

sentences.english: I read hundreds of news sources a day.
sentences.chinese: 我每天閱讀上百條新聞線索。

sentences.english: The investigator was able to uncover new facts about the case.
sentences.chinese: 調查員發現了與案件有關的新線索。

sentences.english: 1a Read the clues and complete the crossword.
sentences.chinese: 根據所給的線索，完成縱橫字謎。

sentences.english: Finally algorithms for removing difficult visitable in postorder threaded binary trees are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了消除二叉後序線索樹中困難訪問的算法。

definition: investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
